summary:
Manar is the Founder and Head of Operations at Zenith PV. Zenith PV is a specialized Pharmacovigilance services firm that partners with senior leaders at established and growing pharma companies to help them attain and maintain compliance to drug safety standards in Canada and globally.

She established Zenith PV in 2020 and rapidly grew the operations by adding several new clients, providing full-service PV and specialised services to mid sized pharmaceutical companies. She built a team of PV professionals to support this growth and at the same time plays an active part in the day to day execution of client projects through direct oversight. Zenith has established its reputation as specialists in PV audits including CAPA management, technical writing including ASRs, SOPs, PM amendments and Risk Management Plans. 

After spending some time in Senior Medical and Operations roles in the pharmaceutical industry, Manar understands firsthand, what it takes to set up and operate a PV team that goes beyond just meeting regulatory requirements. She believes that when done right, PV can play a role in helping physicians develop more confidence in products and build preference for brands.

As an individual, you will find her to be a spirited and engaging entrepreneur. She listens intensely and offers proactive solutions that precisely address the issue at hand. She believes that this level of quality and responsiveness is not common, and clients recognize this through their referrals.
headline: Engaging and Spirited Entrepreneur

message.text:
We are only a few days away from this exciting training program! Learning how to adjust in the ever changing PV landscape is paramount to your success in PV. 

Previously untapped topics in PV and extensive expertise in the industry will be discussed during this rich training program. 

Very limited space left, Register today through the link: 

https://lnkd.in/gFv5y8Du

Only 20 days are left to register for the upcoming Pharmacovigilance (PV) Training Day, taking place on May 28th, 2024, at the Hilton Garden Inn, Montreal Midtown. 

This in-person event promises to be an invaluable opportunity for PV professionals across Canada, offering a rich blend of case-based learning and networking.

Why You Should Attend:

1- Customized Learning Paths: Whether you're beginning your PV career or leading the charge, our dual-track agenda offers tailored insights and strategies.
2- Industry Experts: Learn from seasoned professionals with deep expertise in the Canadian PV landscape, ready to share their knowledge on critical topics such as strategic PV planning, audit readiness, and regulatory reporting.
3- Networking and Beyond: Enjoy ample opportunities to network with fellow professionals over complimentary lunches and refreshment breaks, fostering connections that extend beyond the training day.

Special Offers:

- Group Rates: Bringing a team? Special rates are available for groups of three or more.
- Hotel Discount: Enjoy discounted rates at Hilton Garden Inn. Be sure to contact the hotel directly to book your stay. Limited rooms available.

#pharmacovigilance #training #careerdevelopment

Very exciting times ahead of us! An amazing PV training program put together with tailored agenda to enrich your knowledge and take your career in PV to the next level. 

Workshops, case studies and much more awaits you. Do not miss out on a unique opportunity to learn from renowned PV professionals in Canada. 

Subscribe today! 

#pharmacovigilance #training #career

Hurry and register soon for an Exciting Opportunity to learn and train with the best Canadian Pharmacovigilance Professionals! 

Less than 20 days left to register for an exclusive, in-person training designed specifically for the Canadian PV landscape. Join us at the Hilton Garden Inn, Montreal Midtown on May 28th, 2024, for a day of intensive learning and networking.

Why Attend?

Tailored Agenda: Whether you're new to PV or a seasoned leader looking to enhance your skills, our program is crafted to meet your needs.

Expert-Led Sessions: Delve into the world of PV with sessions led by industry experts, covering strategic planning, regulatory reporting, and more.

Networking Opportunities: Connect with peers during our leisurely networking lunch and refreshment breaks, all included with your registration.

🕘 Schedule at a Glance:
9:00 AM to 12:00 PM: Leadership Training (Strategic Planning, Audit Readiness, KPIs)

1:00 PM to 3:30 PM: Functional Training (Intro to PV, Regulatory Reporting, Introduction to ASRs)

📆 Early Bird Special: Register before April 28th to enjoy a discount. Plus, inquire about our preferred group rates and hotel discounts.

🏨 Venue: Hilton Garden Inn, Montreal Midtown (QC) | 🕘 9:00 AM - 3:30 PM

Need Approval? Contact us to get 'Make a Case to Your Boss' letter to help secure approval from your manager. 

Spaces are limited. Don’t miss this opportunity to elevate your PV skills and network with industry peers.

#Pharmacovigilance #PVTraining #CanadianPVProfessionals #Networking #ProfessionalDevelopment
